policyAssignmentNames.description: Deleting a key vault without soft delete enabled permanently deletes all secrets, keys, and certificates stored in the key vault. Accidental deletion of a key vault can lead to permanent data loss. Soft delete allows you to recover an accidentally deleted key vault for a configurable retention period. No one inside your organization or Microsoft will be able to purge your key vaults during the soft delete retention period.
policyAssignmentNames.displayName: Key vaults should have soft delete and purge protection enabled.
